Package HMS.Systems

Class MedicalRecordSystem

java.lang.Object
HMS.Systems.MedicalRecordSystem
public class MedicalRecordSystem extends Object
System to manage medical records, including saving, updating, and loading records.

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicalRecordSystem

      public MedicalRecordSystem()

  • Method Details

    • showOrCreateMedicalRecord

      public static void showOrCreateMedicalRecord(String patientID)
      Displays the medical record for the given patientID, or prompts the patient to create a new record if no record exists
      Parameters:
      patientID - ID of the patient whose medical record is to be displayed.

    • upsertMedicalRecord

      public static void upsertMedicalRecord(String patientID)
      Creates or updates a medical record for the given patient ID. If no record exists, a new one is created. Prompts the patient for new values, which can be left blank to retain the current value.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose medical record needs to be created or updated.

    • upsertBloodType

      public static void upsertBloodType(String patientID)
      Updates the blood type of medical record and saves the changes to the CSV file. If the medical record does not exist, it creates a new one.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose blood type needs to be updated.

    • upsertDiagnosis

      public static void upsertDiagnosis(String patientID)
      Updates or adds a diagnosis in the medical record and saves the changes to the CSV file. If the medical record does not exist, it creates a new one.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose diagnosis needs to be updated.

    • upsertDiagnosis

      public static void upsertDiagnosis(String patientID, Diagnosis newDiagnosis)
      Adds or updates a diagnosis in the medical record for the given patient ID. If a diagnosis already exists for the condition, it is updated; otherwise, a new one is added.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose diagnosis needs to be updated.

    • saveMedicalRecord

      public static void saveMedicalRecord(MedicalRecord medicalRecord)
      Saves or updates a medical record in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      medicalRecord - the medical record to save or update.

    • loadMedicalRecord

      public static MedicalRecord loadMedicalRecord(String patientID)
      Loads a medical record for a given patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose record needs to be loaded.
      Returns:
      the medical record if found; null otherwise.
